content: **new cal begins november 11th 2024 ** **this beautiful bag is created using the rimple stitch pattern which creates an amazing texture while leaving very little space for items to escape the simple design is created with only 3 pieces to connect together youtube tutorial for the rimple stitch not the bag https //www youtube com/watch v=yqxaw9cmjoo&t=411s if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peaks and free patterns https //www reginapdesigns com/ ***materials *** red heart super saver yarn-soapstone approx 570 yds i boye 5 25mm hook button scissors needle stitch markers are highly recommended for holding your pieces in place while attaching ***abbreviations *** chain = chain skip = skip st = stitch sts = stitches sl= slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet copyright 2023 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent by purchasing/downloading/using any regina p designs patterns you agree to the terms of use -all regina p designs patterns are for personal use only -it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish in any form including video or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages -you are free to do as you wish with the finished products made from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
